briefdescription.para: If this header file is included, will indicate that this designware I2S device is used.

detaileddescription.para: sclk - serial clock ws - word select sd - serial data Transmitter - device that places data on the sd line and is clocked by sclk and ws Receiver - device that receives data from the sd line and is clocked by sclk and ws Master - when configured as a master, DW_apb_i2s initializes the ws signal and supplies the clock gating and clock enabling signals Slave - when configured as a slave, DW_apb_i2s responds to externally generated sclk and ws signals
Set the length of data 16 bits else 32 bits> I2S TX/RX channel
DesignWare interrupt disabled for control I2S irq/fiq
DesignWare interrupt enabled for control I2S irq/fiq
DesignWare interrupt enabled for control transmit process
DesignWare interrupt enabled for control transmit process
I2S word select line (ws_out) stays in the left or right sample mode
Detailed struct description of DesignWare I2S receiver
Detailed struct description of DesignWare I2S transmitter

parameterdescription.para: Device initialized parameters are different with parameters in IP
Close successfully without any issues (including that device is already closed)
Device is still opened, the device opn_cnt decreased by 1
control command, to change or get some thing related to i2s
parameters that maybe argument of the command, or return values of the command, must not be NULL
Device object is not valid or not exists
Parameter is not valid for current control command
Control device failed, due to hardware issues, such as device is disabled
Control device failed, due to different reasons like in transfer state
Control command is not supported or not valid

memberdef.argsstring: (DEV_I2S *i2s_obj, const void *data, uint32_t len, uint32_t channel)
memberdef.name: dw_i2s_write

briefdescription.para: poll transmit data through DesignWare I2S as master or slave

parameterdescription.para: data length need to send, no timeout check
Byte count that was successfully sent for poll method, it might can't send that much due to I2S_ERROR_STATE.
Device object is not valid or not exists
Device is still in transfer state
Can't write data to hardware due to hardware issues, such as device is disabled

briefdescription.para: Read data through DesignWare I2S as master or slave.

parameterdescription.para: data that need to receive (data must be uint32_t type), uint32_t(left) and uint32_t(right) alternating
Byte count that was successfully received for poll method, it might can't send that much due to I2S_ERROR_STATE.
Device object is not valid or not exists
Device is still in receive state
Can't read data from hardware due to hardware issues, such as device is disabled

memberdef.argsstring: (DEV_I2S *i2s_obj, const void *data, uint32_t len, uint32_t channel)
memberdef.name: dw_i2s_write2
